ThreatHitDTO Data Type

Holds information about artifact hits against a threat source.

Properties
name data type description
id string The ID of the hit.
value string The threat source value that caused the hit.
threat_source_id ObjectHandle The ID of the Co3 threat source (see fullOrgDTO.threat_sources).
artifact_type_id ObjectHandle The artifact type that caused the hit.
active boolean Is the threat currently active according to the threat source? For example, if an IP address is identified as "bad" by a threat source it will originally be "active". After the malware is removed from the machine it may get removed from the threat source database, which will cause it to become "inactive" here.

Example

{
  "id" : "...",
  "value" : "...",
  "threat_source_id" : {
    "id" : { },
    "name" : "..."
  },
  "artifact_type_id" : {
    "id" : { },
    "name" : "..."
  },
  "active" : true
}
